rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with wide doorways and wheelchair accessible design.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: An integrated kitchen with modern amenities adjoining a spacious living area, designed for seamless movement and accessibility. Vastu-compliant layout with east-facing entrance.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom featuring built-in storage, a large window offering natural light, and a balcony space ensuring privacy while being wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: The master suite includes an en-suite bathroom with accessibility features, ample closet space, and its own balcony for relaxation. Vastu alignment ensures prosperity.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entry door with wide opening; Vastu compliant entrance placement on the eastern side.

openings.name: Balcony Access Doors
openings.description: Each bedroom has an adjacent balcony door ensuring natural ventilation and sunlight per Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Central Courtyard Entrance
openings.description: A central opening leading to the courtyard promoting light and air circulation. The courtyard is designed in accordance with traditional Chettinad aesthetics while ensuring wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom featuring built-in storage, large windows for natural light and ventilation, and a dedicated balcony ensuring wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Another comfortable bedroom designed with similar amenities as Bedroom 3 to meet the duplex layout, including Vastu compliant positioning.

openings.name: Interior Staircase
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible staircase with a ramp provided on one side to ensure safe vertical movement between floors.

openings.name: Balcony Access Doors for Bedrooms
openings.description: Doorways facilitating access to each bedroom's balcony ensuring proper airflow and sunlight per Vastu recommendations.
